metadata.description: Some plugin repositories related to Claude code

plugins.name: mcp-faster-caller
plugins.description: Optimize the MCP call process. When it comes to MCP call operations, it is highly recommended to use this plugin.

plugins.name: global-java-code-style
plugins.description: Provide standard guidelines for Java coding style, project structure, annotation specifications, exception handling, testing standards, etc.

plugins.name: fintorq-code-style
plugins.description: Official code style and development standards for Fintorq project. MUST be followed for all code generation.

plugins.name: agent-browser-integration-testing
plugins.description: This skill provides atomic browser automation tools driven by the agent - browser CLI. Serving as the "eyes" and "hands" of the AI Agent, it conducts logic - driven web function integration tests through a snapshot + ref workflow, featuring high reliability and efficiency.
